alert.note: Alert for Beaufort; Pitt (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 08 at 7:12PM EDT by NWS Newport/Morehead City
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Pitt and west central Beaufort Counties through 745 PM EDT... At 712 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm capable of producing a landspout near Pactolus, or 7 miles east of Greenville, moving northwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...Landspouts and winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Greenville, Washington, House, Pactolus, Black Jack, East Carolina University, Pitt Greenville Airport, Chocowinity, Grimesland and Simpson. LANDSPOUT...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
